keyFindings: Filter functionality has issues that need to be addressed
Data consistency issues detected between components
Responsive design needs improvement for different screen sizes
Performance optimization needed for better user experience
recommendations: Improve filter state management and persistence
Add more comprehensive filtering options (date range, P&L filtering, etc.)
Ensure data consistency between statistics, radar chart, and trades table
Fix emotional radar chart positioning and update logic
Optimize responsive design for mobile and tablet viewports
Improve touch interaction and mobile usability
Optimize API response times and implement loading states
Reduce memory usage and implement efficient data handling
